backend/main.mo: Defines booking, provider, rental, and user profile types with comparison modules and initializes storage maps for a canister backend.
feature_evidence.json: Describes feature evidence for UI restoration and route‑based visibility with referenced files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend files for documentation or build planning.
frontend/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes using custom color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point mounting the root React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines all application routes using TanStack Router and maps them to page components.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Renders an admin‑only access denied card with a home redirect button.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth state and errors.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireLogi: Gatekeeper component that shows a login prompt when the user is not authenticated.
frontend/src/components/bookings/Booking: Maps booking statuses to labeled UI badges with variant styling.
Clickable EYEGIC text logo component with header and default size variants.
frontend/src/components/forms/Availabili: Provides a date picker supporting single or range selection with time inputs and outputs a formatted availability string.
frontend/src/components/forms/MobileNumb: Handles mobile number input, validation, OTP sending flow, and submission once verified.
frontend/src/components/forms/MockOtpVer: Implements a mock 4-digit OTP flow with generation, input, verification, and resend support.
frontend/src/components/forms/OptionalPh: Allows optional image upload with preview and removal, reporting the file to a parent component.
frontend/src/components/forms/RepairIssu: Renders checkboxes for selecting multiple repair issue types and updates the parent on changes.
frontend/src/components/icons/WhatsAppIc: SVG component rendering the WhatsApp logo.
frontend/src/components/layout/header/Ad: Shows admin notification count and navigates to notifications page on click.
frontend/src/components/layout/header/My: Displays profile navigation button with completion percentage for authenticated users.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageLayou: Page wrapper that applies max-width, optional title/description, and layout spacing.
frontend/src/components/layout/RootLayou: Top-level layout including header, footer, and routed page outlet.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer with links, contact actions, branding, and build identifier display.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Header component with navigation, auth controls, contact menu, and mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/FrameSha: Exports a set of SVG icons representing various eyeglass frame shapes.
Checkbox-based picker allowing users to select multiple eyeglass frame shapes.
frontend/src/config/buildInfo.ts: Defines the build identifier shown in the UI.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useMobileNumber: Fetches mobile number verification logs via actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useIsCallerAdmin: Checks whether the current caller has admin privileges.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useBooking.t: Retrieves a booking by ID using actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useCreateOpt: Creates an optician booking and invalidates customer bookings cache.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useCreateRen: Creates a rental booking and refreshes customer bookings.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useCreateRep: Creates a repair booking and invalidates related booking queries.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useCustomerB: Fetches all bookings for the current customer.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useGetBookin: Another hook for fetching a booking by ID via actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useLogMobile: Logs a mobile number verification event using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useProviderB: Fetches bookings assigned to the current provider.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useUpdateBoo: Updates a booking's status and invalidates booking-related caches.
frontend/src/hooks/profile/useCallerUser: Fetches the current user's profile and exposes loading helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/profile/useProfileCom: Retrieves and normalizes the user's profile completion percentage.
frontend/src/hooks/profile/useProfilePic: Mutations for updating profile and prescription pictures and refreshing profile data.
frontend/src/hooks/profile/useSaveCaller: Saves the caller's user profile and invalidates profile-related queries.
Loads provider data for the authenticated identity and offers provider onboarding.
frontend/src/hooks/rentals/useRentalCata: Fetches the list of available rental items.
frontend/src/hooks/routing/useIsHomeRout: Returns true if the current route path is the home route.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and auth-client configuration.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, theme variables, dark mode styles, and reusable component utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminNotificati: Displays admin-only mobile number verification logs with loading and access control states.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/BookingDetai: Shows detailed booking information with type labels, pricing, and loading/error handling.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/mobile-optic: Shows confirmation details for a mobile optician booking, handling invalid or missing booking IDs and loading states.
Multi‑step form for creating a mobile optician booking, including OTP verification, service selection, and submission.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/MyBookingsPa: Displays the logged‑in user's bookings with status, schedule, address, and total price, using cards and a loading state.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/rentals/Rent: Displays confirmation and payment breakdown for a completed rental booking, with options to return home or view bookings.
Form to create a rental booking for a selected item, calculating price based on rental days and submitting booking details.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/repairs/Repa: Shows confirmation details of a repair request, handling invalid IDs, errors, and booking status display.
Multi‑step repair request form with OTP verification, repair details, and booking submission using createRepairBooking.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with services, OTP verification flow, and navigation to service pages.
frontend/src/pages/profile/MyProfilePage: User profile editor supporting personal info, frame preferences, and profile/prescription picture upload and preview.
frontend/src/pages/provider/ProviderDash: Provider dashboard showing profile details, bookings, and allowing booking status updates.
frontend/src/pages/provider/ProviderOnbo: Provider onboarding form handling verification, service selection, availability, and submission validation.
frontend/src/pages/rentals/RentalItemDet: Displays rental item details with availability, pricing, and navigation back to the catalog.
frontend/src/pages/rentals/RentalsCatalo: A catalog page that loads rental items, applies search and category filters, and displays item cards with availability.
frontend/src/pages/services/MobileOptici: A service page describing the mobile optician offering with features, imagery, and a booking button.
A promotional page explaining eyewear rentals, highlighting benefits, and linking to the rental catalog.
A service page listing available eyewear repair services with visuals and a button to book repairs.
frontend/src/pages/settings/BrandingLogo: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Provides helper functions to format numbers as INR currency strings.
frontend/src/utils/homeOtpSession.ts: Manages sessionStorage state for home-flow OTP verification and associated mobile numbers.
frontend/src/utils/logoDataUrl.ts: Empty utility file with no implementation.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Validation helpers for phone numbers, emails, and PIN codes along with sanitization functions.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with dark mode, content paths, extended color themes, custom border radii, shadows, and animation keyframes.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, known UI issues, existing features, and a pending request to restore missing header icons.
